title: The Favorites - Super Bowl Betting Trends
itunes:title: The Favorites - Super Bowl Betting Trends
description:
Just ten days remain before Super Bowl LVI, so Action Network Chief Content Officer Chad Millman and professional sports bettor Simon Hunter bring on Stuckey (host of The Action Network Podcast and Big Bets On Campus) to break down the game from a historical perspective. The NFL has been hosting Super Bowls since 1967, so what analytical trends has Stuckey unearthed that could inform our betting decisions next Sunday? Does the spread actually matter in this game? Do the Bengals have the profile of a champion? Just how long will the National Anthem last? All this and plenty more as our betting build up to the Super Bowl continues!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
